name: SRSensor
desc: The sensors an app can read.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a sensor from raw value.

items.name: static let accelerometer: SRSensor
items.desc: A sensor that provides acceleration motion data.

items.name: static let rotationRate: SRSensor
items.desc: A sensor that provides rotation motion data.

items.name: static let ambientLightSensor: SRSensor
items.desc: A sensor that provides ambient light information.

items.name: static let ambientPressure: SRSensor
items.desc: A sensor that provides pressure and temperature metrics.

items.name: static let onWristState: SRSensor
items.desc: A sensor that describes the watch’s position on the wrist.

items.name: static let pedometerData: SRSensor
items.desc: A sensor that provides information about the user's steps.

items.name: static let visits: SRSensor
items.desc: A sensor that provides information about the user’s frequently visited locations.

items.name: static let keyboardMetrics: SRSensor
items.desc: A sensor that provides information about the user’s keyboard usage.

items.name: static let deviceUsageReport: SRSensor
items.desc: A sensor that provides information about the user’s device usage.

items.name: static let messagesUsageReport: SRSensor
items.desc: A sensor that provides information about the user’s use of the Messages app.

items.name: static let phoneUsageReport: SRSensor
items.desc: A sensor that reports the amount of time that the user is on phone calls.

items.name: static let siriSpeechMetrics: SRSensor
items.desc: A sensor that provides data describing a user's speech to Siri.

items.name: static let telephonySpeechMetrics: SRSensor
items.desc: A sensor that provides data describing a user’s speech during phone calls.
